title: Ghost Nation
overview: Paranormal investigators from across the country team up to solve baffling cases. They will have "state-of-the-art technology" to assist them in studying the hauntings as well as debunking less than authentic claims. Most importantly, they are looking to help people who are experiencing paranormal activity. By getting to the heart of what is causing the hauntings, they will be able to assist the living by restoring a sense of normalcy and the dead by helping them move on.
